title: Sustainability-Integrated Engineering Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and management experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are in managerial/leadership roles with limited experience in sustainability-related decision-making. A blended learning environment utilizing personal devices is necessary.

learning_goals: Learners can write a 5-page report explaining the environmental, social, and cultural dimensions of sustainability.
Learners can develop and present team-based project proposals that incorporate sustainability concepts and defend them.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in a flipped learning environment and achieve an implementation rate of over 80%.
Learners can improve communication skills by exchanging peer feedback at least three times using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
